title: CSV to Table Image
description:
🎯 Key Features: 
• One-click CSV/TSV conversion 
• 14 professionally designed table styles 
• Real-time preview 
• Custom width adjustment
• Text alignment options 
• No registration required

✨ Why we built this: Sharing table data on social media or in presentations often results in poor formatting or requires complex screenshot editing. We created this tool to make it simple to generate beautiful, consistent table images from your data in seconds.
